statements: SELECT * FROM kpi_reports
SELECT report_name, kpi_1 FROM kpi_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-03-15'
SELECT report_name, kpi_1, kpi_2 FROM kpi_reports WHERE kpi_1 > 100 AND kpi_2 < 50
SELECT * FROM kpi_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM kpi_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, report_date, kpi_1, kpi_2 FROM kpi_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM kpi_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%Sales%' AND kpi_1 > 1000 ORDER BY kpi_1 ASC, report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, AVG(kpi_1) AS avg_kpi1, AVG(kpi_2) AS avg_kpi2 FROM kpi_reports GROUP BY report_name HAVING AVG(kpi_1) > 500
SELECT report_name, report_date, (kpi_1 + kpi_2) AS total_kpi FROM kpi_reports WHERE kpi_1 > 500 AND kpi_2 < 300
SELECT report_name, report_date, CASE WHEN kpi_1 > kpi_2 THEN 'Above Target' ELSE 'Below Target' END AS kpi_status FROM kpi_reports
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_date, kpi_1 FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT id, kpi_1, kpi_2 FROM reports WHERE kpi_1 > 100;
SELECT op_name, op_type FROM operations WHERE op_location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY op_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE kpi_2 IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, kpi_1 FROM reports WHERE kpi_1 > 100 AND kpi_2 < 50;
SELECT * FROM operations WHERE op_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT op_name, op_type, COUNT(*) FROM operations GROUP BY op_name, op_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM KPI_Reports;
SELECT report_name, kpi_value FROM KPI_Reports ORDER BY kpi_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Operations_Data WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT operation_name FROM Operations_Data WHERE op_id = 1;
SELECT unit_name, location FROM Biotech_Units WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Biotech_Units WHERE location='California' ORDER BY unit_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, kpi_value FROM KPI_Reports WHERE kpi_value > 1000 ORDER BY kpi_value ASC;
SELECT operation_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric FROM Operations_Data GROUP BY operation_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50 ORDER BY average_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM KPI_Reports r INNER JOIN Operations_Data o ON r.id = o.op_id WHERE r.kpi_value > 500 AND o.metric_value < 100 ORDER BY r.id;
SELECT unit_name, location FROM Biotech_Units WHERE location='New York' OR location='California' AND unit_name LIKE '%Research%';
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, kpi1 FROM reports WHERE kpi2 > 100;
SELECT operation_name, location FROM operations ORDER BY operation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM indicators WHERE weightage < 0.5;
SELECT biotech_name, category, region FROM biotech WHERE category = 'Pharma';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE kpi1 > 100 ORDER BY report_name ASC
SELECT id, report_name FROM reports WHERE kpi2 < 50 ORDER BY report_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM operations WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT AVG(weightage) AS avg_weightage FROM indicators WHERE weightage > 0.5
SELECT SUM(kpi1 + kpi2) AS total_kpi FROM reports WHERE kpi1 < 200 AND kpi2 > 50
SELECT * FROM KPI_Reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM KPI_Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Operations_Plant WHERE location='New York';
SELECT equipment_name, plant_id FROM Production_Equipment WHERE plant_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT staff_name, role, plant_id FROM Operation_Staff WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT * FROM KPI_Reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM KPI_Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT Operations_Plant.plant_name, Operation_Staff.staff_name, Performance_Records.performance_score FROM Operations_Plant JOIN Operation_Staff ON Operations_Plant.plant_id = Operation_Staff.plant_id JOIN Performance_Records ON Operation_Staff.staff_id = Performance_Records.staff_id WHERE Performance_Records.performance_score > 90 ORDER BY Performance_Records.performance_score DESC;

SELECT Operations_Plant.plant_name, Operation_Staff.staff_name, Production_Equipment.equipment_name FROM Operations_Plant JOIN Operation_Staff ON Operations_Plant.plant_id = Operation_Staff.plant_id JOIN Production_Equipment ON Operations_Plant.plant_id = Production_Equipment.plant_id WHERE Production_Equipment.equipment_name LIKE '%Machinery%' ORDER BY Operations_Plant.plant_name ASC, Operation_Staff.staff_name ASC;

SELECT Performance_Records.record_id, Operation_Staff.staff_name, Operations_Plant.location, Performance_Records.record_date FROM Performance_Records JOIN Operation_Staff ON Performance_Records.staff_id = Operation_Staff.staff_id JOIN Production_Equipment ON Performance_Records.equipment_id = Production_Equipment.equipment_id JOIN Operations_Plant ON Production_Equipment.plant_id = Operations_Plant.plant_id WHERE Performance_Records.record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY Performance_Records.record_date ASC, Operation_Staff.staff_name DESC;
